name: ogy
description: A tool to export and import Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's Tag Force 6 card translations

scripts.test: node --loader ts-node/esm node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha.js --require ts-node/register -S --bail --reporter mochawesome --timeout 10000 --exit test/index.spec.ts

author: Sten Feldman <exile@chamber.ee>
